mapper.select: select * from user_order where email = #{email} order by order_no desc

select pd.*, uod.*, a.*, pp.*, p.* from product p, product_photo pp, product_detail pd, (select * from user_order_detail where order_no=#{orderNo}) uod, address a, (select * from user_order where order_no=#{orderNo}) uo where pd.product_detail_no=uod.product_detail_no and uo.addr_no=a.addr_no and pd.product_no=pp.product_no and pd.product_no=p.product_no and batch = 1 and pd.color = pp.color

select * from user_order_detail uod, user_order uo, address a, product p, product_detail pd, product_photo pp where pd.product_detail_no=uod.product_detail_no and uod.order_detail_no=#{orderDetailNo} and p.product_no=pp.product_no and p.product_no=pd.product_no and uo.addr_no=a.addr_no and uo.order_no=uod.order_no and pd.color=pp.color and batch = 1
select uo.*, uod.* from user_order uo, user_order_detail uod where uo.order_no = uod.order_no and uo.email = #{email} order by uo.order_no desc

select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select uo.* from user_order uo, user_order_detail uod
${keyword} like '%' || #{search} || '%' and
uo.order_no=uod.order_no and uod.refund_chk = 'A'
order by uo.order_no desc) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
